scripts.build:frontend: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- sh -c 'tsc --project frontend/config/tsconfig.app.json --skipLibCheck && VITE_TSCONFIG=frontend/config/tsconfig.app.json vite build --config frontend/config/vite.config.ts --emptyOutDir'
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker ps -aq | xargs -r docker rm -f && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f
scripts.docker:db: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -fs database && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d database
scripts.docker:db:rebuild: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -fs database && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d --build database
scripts.docker:deploy: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.docker:deploy:rebuild: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:down: pnpm docker:stop && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down --remove-orphans
scripts.docker:frontend: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -fs frontend && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d frontend
scripts.docker:frontend:rebuild: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -fs frontend && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d --build frontend
scripts.docker:logs: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml logs
scripts.docker:logs:frontend: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml logs frontend
scripts.docker:logs:server: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml logs server
scripts.docker:server: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -fs server && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d server
scripts.docker:server:rebuild: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml rm -fs server && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d --build server
scripts.docker:test: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile test run --rm --no-deps --use-aliases test pnpm test
scripts.docker:test:rebuild: dotenv -e env/.env.${ENV_TYPE} -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile test build test && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile test run --rm --use-aliases test pnpm test
scripts.docker:up: dotenv -e env/.env.development -- docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.fly:deploy:frontend: pnpm sync:fly:env:frontend && ENV_TYPE=prod fly deploy --config docker/fly-config/fly.frontend.toml
scripts.fly:deploy:server: pnpm sync:fly:env:server && ENV_TYPE=prod fly deploy --config docker/fly-config/fly.server.toml
